titleStmt.title: Whereas the commissioners appointed for rating and assessing the several subsidies granted to His Majestie by the Parliament, lately sitting in this kingdom, have in several counties neglected to make returnes of the estreates of the said subsidies into His Majesties Court of Exchequer ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, J. Roberts.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1669-1670 : Radnor)

titleStmt.title: Whereas the commissioners appointed for rating and assessing the several subsidies granted to His Majestie by the Parliament, lately sitting in this kingdom, have in several counties neglected to make returnes of the estreates of the said subsidies into His Majesties Court of Exchequer ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, J. Roberts.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1669-1670 : Radnor)
Radnor, John Robartes, Earl of, 1606-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 7 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
"Given at the Councell chamber in Dublin the 29th day of October 1669."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
